title: Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for January 2025
description: The puzzle solutions for January 2025. The post Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for January 2025 appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Nicholas Tan
excerpt: Here is the answer to the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle today for January 2025, plus the solutions to the other puzzles in the game.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer throughout the month of January 2025. We will also provide answers to today’s standard puzzles and toss-ups. We will update this article daily (I’m finally back from the holidays!), so we recommend that you check back on a regular basis. The episodes from January 27 to January 31, 2025 will have an American the Beautiful theme, so we wouldn’t be surprised if some of the answers to this week’s puzzles are patriotic. Hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White, tonight’s game will feature three new contestants: Shaun Terbeest, Marilyn Harrod, and Denise Robinson. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for January 30. What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight? The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Thursday, January 30, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode. Bonus Round Puzzle – BANK VAULT [Place] Tossup #1 – HOTEL CALIFORNIA [Song Title] Tossup #2 – THE HEARTLAND [Place] Regular Puzzle #1 – FISHING, BREAKER, RINK, AGE [Crossword: Ice What?] Regular Puzzle #2 – NEW YORK STOCK EXCHANGE [Landmark] Regular Puzzle #3 – BLACK BEARS & BROWN BEARS [Living Things] Tossup #3 – WHITE-COLLAR [Thing] Tossup #4 – BLUE-COLLAR [Thing] Tossup #5 – DOG COLLAR [Thing] Regular Puzzle #4 – LET’S MAKE IT OFFICIAL [Phrase] And here are yesterday’s puzzle answers for Wednesday, January 29: Bonus Round Puzzle – JOKING AROUND [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #1 – A REAL SHOWSTOPPER [Thing] Tossup #2 – THANK YOU FOR BEING A FRIEND [Song Title] Regular Puzzle #1 – INDEPENDENCE HALL IN PHILADELPHIA [Landmark] Regular Puzzle #2 – TWILIGHT & TOW-AWAY ZONE [Same Name] Regular Puzzle #3 – SENDING POSTCARDS [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #3 – JEWELRY BOX [Around the House] Tossup #4 – CEREAL BOX [Around the House Tossup #5 – CABLE BOX [Around the House] Regular Puzzle #4 – NO STRINGS ATTACHED [Phrase] The Fan Friday contest by Collette is still active and a new word for the sweepstakes will be posted at some time during the January 31 episode. From now until the end of the season, you can earn an additional entry for the $50K for Our 50th Giveaway when you enter the Fan Friday contest. In a few weeks, from February 3 to February 7, Wheel Watchers can win a getaway by Collette to visit Scotland, Ireland, Iceland, Peru, and Spain. Rules for this Spin, Solve & See The World Giveaway can be found here.
html:
Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer throughout the month of January 2025. We will also provide answers to today’s standard puzzles and toss-ups. We will update this article daily (I’m finally back from the holidays!), so we recommend that you check back on a regular basis.

The episodes from January 27 to January 31, 2025 will have an American the Beautiful theme, so we wouldn’t be surprised if some of the answers to this week’s puzzles are patriotic. Hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White, tonight’s game will feature three new contestants: Shaun Terbeest, Marilyn Harrod, and Denise Robinson. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for January 30.

What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight?

The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Thursday, January 30, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode.

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – BANK VAULT [Place]
  • Tossup #1 – HOTEL CALIFORNIA [Song Title]
  • Tossup #2 – THE HEARTLAND [Place]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – FISHING, BREAKER, RINK, AGE [Crossword: Ice What?]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – NEW YORK STOCK EXCHANGE [Landmark]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – BLACK BEARS & BROWN BEARS [Living Things]
  • Tossup #3 – WHITE-COLLAR [Thing]
  • Tossup #4 – BLUE-COLLAR [Thing]
  • Tossup #5 – DOG COLLAR [Thing]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – LET’S MAKE IT OFFICIAL [Phrase]

And here are yesterday’s puzzle answers for Wednesday, January 29:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – JOKING AROUND [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #1 – A REAL SHOWSTOPPER [Thing]
  • Tossup #2 – THANK YOU FOR BEING A FRIEND [Song Title]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – INDEPENDENCE HALL IN PHILADELPHIA [Landmark]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – TWILIGHT & TOW-AWAY ZONE [Same Name]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – SENDING POSTCARDS [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #3 – JEWELRY BOX [Around the House]
  • Tossup #4 – CEREAL BOX [Around the House
  • Tossup #5 – CABLE BOX [Around the House]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – NO STRINGS ATTACHED [Phrase]

The Fan Friday contest by Collette is still active and a new word for the sweepstakes will be posted at some time during the January 31 episode. From now until the end of the season, you can earn an additional entry for the $50K for Our 50th Giveaway when you enter the Fan Friday contest.

In a few weeks, from February 3 to February 7, Wheel Watchers can win a getaway by Collette to visit Scotland, Ireland, Iceland, Peru, and Spain. Rules for this Spin, Solve & See The World Giveaway can be found here.
